perturbation.original_text: Heritage shall purchase all ingredients and packaging materials identified in Schedule C to be used in connection with the manufacture of the Products. Heritage shall invoice Premier through the [***] billing as identified on Schedule C.
perturbation.changed_text: Heritage shall procure all ingredients and packaging materials identified in Schedule C to be used in connection with the manufacture of the Products. Heritage shall invoice Premier through the [***] billing as identified on Schedule C.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'purchase' and 'procure' are used interchangeably, however, they have different meanings, which can cause confusion regarding ownership and liability. 'Purchase' implies a transfer of ownership and associated risks, whereas 'procure' can imply simply obtaining or acquiring something, which does not necessarily mean ownership. This can cause a contradiction of which party takes title.

perturbation.original_text: Heritage will keep, and will ensure that Jasper keeps [***] complete and accurate records in connection with each unique production lot of Products with respect to manufacturing practices, quality assurance measures, analytical procedures and their resultant data. Such records shall include at least those listed on attached Schedule B. Upon reasonable notice, Heritage shall allow, and Heritage shall ensure that Japer allows, Premier access to such records during normal working hours.
perturbation.changed_text: Heritage will maintain, and will ensure that Jasper maintains [***] complete and accurate records in connection with each unique production lot of Products with respect to manufacturing practices, quality assurance measures, analytical procedures and their resultant data. Such records shall include at least those listed on attached Schedule B. Upon reasonable notice, Heritage shall allow, and Heritage shall ensure that Japer allows, Premier access to such records during normal working hours.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'keep' and 'maintain' are used interchangeably. 'Keep' implies a state of preservation, whereas 'maintain' implies regular attention and upkeep, which could include updating and correcting. These different interpretations could lead to disputes over the expected standard of record-keeping.

perturbation.original_text: Premier shall have the sole right, exercisable in its discretion, to initiate and direct the content and scope of a recall, market withdrawal, stock recovery, product correction and/or advisory safety communication (any one or more referred to as a “Recall Action”) regarding the Products. At Premier’s option, Premier can direct Heritage to, and upon such direction Heritage shall, conduct such Recall Action (and Heritage shall ensure Jasper’s cooperation). Premier shall determine, in its sole discretion, the manner, text and timing of any publicity to be given such matters upon prior consultation with Heritage.
perturbation.changed_text: Premier shall have the sole authority, exercisable in its discretion, to initiate and direct the content and scope of a recall, market withdrawal, stock recovery, product correction and/or advisory safety communication (any one or more referred to as a “Recall Action”) regarding the Products. At Premier’s option, Premier can direct Heritage to, and upon such direction Heritage shall, conduct such Recall Action (and Heritage shall ensure Jasper’s cooperation). Premier shall determine, in its sole discretion, the manner, text and timing of any publicity to be given such matters upon prior consultation with Heritage.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'right' and 'authority' are used interchangeably. While they can be similar, in legal contexts, 'right' often refers to a legal or moral entitlement, while 'authority' refers to a power or permission to act. Using them interchangeably creates a subtle difference, and possible contradiction in the scope of control over the Recall Action. One suggests a foundational claim and the other a derivative permission.
